#ext-gen1052#:
The 'Google Map' block displays a map with location-based content returned by a query.

The map can be centered on an address or the location of the user.

Facets-based research can be activated and coupled with the map.
#ext-gen1070#: The 'Calendar' block displays the calendar view of a list of dated contents (events, appointments, etc)
#ext-gen1102#: The 'Content Detail' block displays the fields of a particular content.
#ext-gen1110#:
The 'Content list' block displays a list of content using a query building Wizard. Three types of queries are available:

  • Manual (manual selection of ordered content to display)
  • single (choice of a type of content, taxonomy, sorting rules)
  • Advanced (content types multiple, advanced taxonomy criteria on fields systems, sorting rules)
#ext-gen1125#:
The 'Rich text' block allows you to simply integrate a block of rich text in a page.

The text is linked to the page and is not exploitable in the contents window
#ext-gen1131#:
The 'Simple text' block allows to simply integrate a block of text in a page.

The text is linked to the page and is not exploitable in the contents window.
#ext-gen1137#: The 'Zend controller' block allows developers to instantiate a Zend Framework controller directly in a block.
#ext-gen1146#: The 'Twig template' block allows a developer to instantiate a Twig template directly in a block for a specific need.
#ext-gen1152#: The 'Newsletter Subscription' block displays a registration form to a mailing list.
#ext-gen1167#: The 'Advanced contact' block displays an advanced contact form based on a template.
#ext-gen1180#: The 'Survey' block displays a survey created using the Surveys module.
#ext-gen1189#: The 'Audio' block displays an audio media player (mp3,...)
#ext-gen1199#: The 'Image gallery' block displays a gallery of images stored in the Rubedo DAM.
#ext-gen1208#: The 'Flickr Gallery' block displays a gallery of images from Flickr, filtered through a user account or a list of tags.
#ext-gen1220#: The 'Image' block displays an image stored in the Rubedo DAM.
#ext-gen1232#: The 'Media list' block displays a list of digital assets (document, image, video, audio, ...) based on a query (choice of media types and applied facets).
#ext-gen1243#:
The 'External Media' block relies on the oEmbed (http://oembed.com/) API and allows to display external media from the following sources:

  • YouTube (videos)
  • Dailymotion (videos)
  • Flickr (photo sharing)
  • Vimeo (videos)
  • Poll Everywhere (investigations amp; surveys)
  • My Opera (blogs and photos)
  • SmugMug (photo sharing)
  • SlideShare (sharing presentations)
  • WordPress.com (blogging)
  • chirbit.com (sharing of audio files)
  • CircuitLab (electrical diagram tool)
  • Funtrivia.com (survey tool)
#ext-gen1251#: The 'Media download' block allows for anonymous download of media.
#ext-gen1258#: The 'Protected media download' block allows users to download a media through an invitation by e-mail.
#ext-gen1266#: The 'Vidéo' block displays a video stored in the Rubedo DAM. The default used player is JW Player.
#ext-gen1279#: The 'Breadcrumb' block allows to automatically display a view of the position of the current page in the site tree.
#ext-gen1285#:
The 'Menu' block displays a navigation menu, horizontal or vertical, from the selected level.

It can be used interchangeably to create the main site navigation bar or to create secondary menus within the topics.
#ext-gen1300#: The 'Site map' block displays the site map.
#ext-gen1309#: The 'Search form' block displays a form redirecting to a search page.
#ext-gen1325#:
The 'Search Page' block displays the result of a search. It may be limited:

  • to part of the site (workspace)
  • to a set of types of content or documents (media, desktop) given

search engine generates automatically the facets from the vocabularies used to classify content and a number of exploitable metadata for all content types (type, author, date, etc)
#ext-gen1333#: The 'AddThis Follow' block allows you to add icons of redirection to different social networks.
#ext-gen1355#: The 'AddThis Share' block allows to add various social media sharing features to the current page
#ext-gen1367#: The 'Authentication' block allows a user to authenticate from the Front-Office.
#ext-gen1378#: The 'Language menu' block allows a user to select a viewing lanuage for this site in the Front-Office.
#ext-gen1401#: The 'Image map' block allows a user to create an image map using an image from the DAM
#ext-gen1403#:
The 'Twitter' block displays a list of tweets from a Twitter account. The block allows to :

  • define the number of tweets to display
  • configure block dimensions
  • define display options
#ext-gen1404#: Requires the creation of a new widget in the Twitter account in order to define a 'widget id'
#ext-gen1408#: The 'Advanced search form' block displays a search form limitated to one or several content types. The form displays the available vocabularies for choosen content types as combo boxes.
#ext-gen1428#: This block allows you to display graphical representations of data using Rubedo queries.
#ext-gen1429#: The 'Unsubscribe' block alows users to unsubscribre from mailing lists.
#ext-gen1430#: The 'Sign up' block allows new users to create an account.
#ext-gen1481#: 'Category' block provides quick access to product categories. Various display options are available.
#ext-gen1482#: The 'User orders' block shows to the logged customer his orders list.
#ext-gen1483#: The 'Order detail' block allows you to display the order summary. The page in which this block is included will be displayed once an order is validated and when the customer wants to check the details of an order from the orders list.
#ext-gen1484#: The 'Product List' block is a default list view that displays products in a grid with access to product detail and adding to cart.
#ext-gen1485#:
The 'Shopping Cart' block offers two display modes:
The button mode allows access to cart detail and proceed to checkout.
The detail mode allows access to checkout.
#ext-gen1486#: The 'Product Search' block displays a product search page with a default layout.
#ext-gen1487#: The 'Checkout' block displays a one-page checkout form.
#ext-gen1488#:
The 'Development' block is a container for writing your own AngularJS template code.
The code can mix regular HTML5 combined with AngularJS directives.
#ext-gen1493#: The 'Content contribution' block allows loged users with the write 'FO content contributor' to create contents directly into a page
#ext-gen1501#: Contains all the terms or at least a descendant per term
#ext-gen1502#: Contains at least one of the terms
#ext-gen1503#: Contains at least one of the terms or at least one of the descendants of one of the terms
#ext-gen1504#: Does not contain any of the following terms
#ext-gen1505#: Does not contain the following terms or their descendants
